concept.title: Historical Data and Rollup Report Suites
concept.shortdesc: SiteCatalyst 15 data can be viewed in the version 14 and 13.5 interfaces. However, version 15 features, like segmentation, full subrelations, and reporting on new metrics are not applicable to data collected before your upgrade date.

conbody.p: Rollup report suites are provided in SiteCatalyst 15 with some limitations outlined in Rollup Report Suites.
